articles.title: British fashion brand Timbuktu accused of 'cultural appropriation' for trademarking 'Yoruba' - CNN
articles.description: A British clothing retailer has come under fire for trademarking the name of the west African Yoruba people several years ago, igniting a debate online about whether trademarking names of ethnic groups amounts to cultural appropriation.
